steps.title: Initial Entry
steps.description: Enter the four-digit code on the keypad. The order of entry does not matter.

steps.title: Troubleshooting: Screen Lock
steps.description: If the screen locks up (numbers displayed, unresponsive), repeatedly press any key on the keypad until the screen goes blank and a red light blinks. This resets the keypad.

steps.title: Re-entry after Lockup
steps.description: Once the screen is reset (blank with a red blink), re-enter the four-digit code to access the system.

steps.title: Successful Entry Confirmation
steps.description: Confirm successful system access after code entry.

steps.title: Troubleshooting: Incorrect Entry
steps.description: If the code is entered incorrectly (too fast, wrong numbers), the screen might lock. Follow the 'Troubleshooting: Screen Lock' steps and try entering the code again.
